name: Dragon Child
description: A descendant of a line of dragons going back to ancient days. Can use swords unique to the Divine Dragon.

name: Divine Dragon
skillDescription: Unit's engage meter is shortened one step.
description: Keeper of the power of the great reigning dragon. Uses Divine Dragon swords and martial arts.

name: Fell Child
skillDescription: At the start of each turn, unit's engage meter is filled by 1.
description: Inheritor of the blood of the Fell Dragon. Excels in Fell skills and powerful dark magic.

name: Noble
description: One born into a noble royal family. A proficient horseman and skilled lancer.

name: Avenir
skillDescription: During combat, may prevent 50% of physical damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.
description: A dashing prince who rides a white horse into battle. Excels with a lance and serviceable with a blade.

name: Noble
description: One born into a noble royal family. A proficient magic user who is also serviceable with a sword.

name: Vidame
maxWeapons: Sword B, Tome A, Staff B
skillDescription: During combat, may add half of Str to magic damage or half of Mag to all other damage. Trigger %=Dex.
description: Magic-wielding swordswoman who can cut through enemy mages. She is also capable of wielding staves.

name: Lord
description: One born into a family that leads a nation. Proficient with a sword.

name: Successeur
skillDescription: Unit may recover HP=50% damage dealt. Trigger %=Dex.
description: One with the will and strength to lead a nation. Skilled with both the blade and the axe.

name: Lord
description: One born into a family that leads a nation. Proficient with a bow.

name: Tireur d'élite
skillDescription: While making an attack, may ignore half of foe's Def/Res. Trigger %=Dex.
description: An archer gifted with incredible aim. Each shot can eliminate a foe.

name: Wing Tamer
description: A knight who has a rapport with beasts. Rides a wyvern into battle and uses magic and staves.

name: Lindwurm
skillDescription: When attacking with a tome, unit may deal extra damage = half of foe's Mag. Trigger %=Dex.
description: A magic-using wyvern rider who destroys enemies from above. Can use powerful magic and staves.

name: Wing Tamer
description: A knight who has a rapport with beasts. Rides a pegasus into battle and is skilled with tome and staff.

name: Sleipnir Rider
skillDescription: When unit uses a staff, may not consume a use. Trigger %=Dex.
description: A knight who rides the charming pegasus Sleipnir. Uses powerful staves and is skilled with tomes.

name: Sentinel
description: A Sentinel who takes up arms to defend her nation. Proficient with the lance.

name: Picket
skillDescription: While making a physical attack, may calculate damage with 150% of Def instead of Str. Trigger %=Dex.
description: A lancer who pierces the enemy lines with flawless skill. Her bouncy steps presage deadly attacks.

name: Sentinel
description: A Sentinel who takes up arms to defend his nation. A proficient rider and archer.

name: Cupido
skillDescription: When countering, unit may deal extra damage = half of damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.
description: A charming bow knight who fights with casual flair. Skilled with both bow and sword, he toys with his foe.

name: Sword Fighter
description: Footsoldiers who take pride in their skill with a blade. They avoid enemy attacks with nimble footwork.

name: Swordmaster
skillDescription: Use to attack an adjacent foe, then move to the space opposite that foe.
description: Master sword fighters who avoid attacks by a hair's breadth and retaliate with mighty skills.

name: Hero
maxWeapons: Sword A, Lance C+, Axe C+
skillDescription: If unit's HP is at max while unit makes a chain attack, unit attacks twice.
description: Accomplished veterans proficient in several weapons and can easily cut through the front lines.

name: Lance Fighter
description: Soldiers who fight with a lance. They strike just the right balance between offense and defense.

name: Halberdier
skillDescription: If unit initiates combat while an ally is on the opposite side of the foe, always follow up (if weapon allows).
description: Lance-wielders with a great deal of battlefield experience. Several cuts above common lance fighters.

name: Royal Knight
skillDescription: If unit's HP is 11 or more and an adjacent ally is broken after combat, sacrifices 10 HP and removes the break status from that ally.
description: Noble knights who tear across the battlefield on horseback, rallying their allies. They can also use staves.

name: Axe Fighter
description: Proven warriors with an axe. Their swings are fierce, but leave them open to retaliation.

name: Berserker
skillDescription: When making a smash attack, push the target 2 spaces instead of 1.
description: Mighty warriors of unparalleled strength. They cleave foes in twain with huge axes.

name: Warrior
skillDescription: Unit deals +50% damage against broken foes.
description: Skilled experts in annihilating their enemies. They are capable with bows as well as axes.

name: Archer
description: Light infantry who fight with a bow. They can attack from a distance.

name: Sniper
skillDescription: Grants Crit+10 during combat with a foe that can't counter.
description: Masters of the bow who target their foes' weak points with precision strikes.

name: Bow Knight
maxWeapons: Sword C+, Lance C+, Axe C+, Bow A
skillDescription: If unit initiates combat without moving first, grants Hit+40 during combat.
description: Bow users that fire from the saddle and outflank foes with high mobility.

name: Sword Armor
description: Heavily armored sword fighters clad in tough armor. They have high defense, but magic is their bane.

name: Lance Armor
description: Heavily armored lancers clad in tough armor. They have high defense, but magic is their bane.

name: Axe Armor
description: Heavily armored axe-wielders clad in tough armor. They have high defense, but magic is their bane.

name: General
maxWeapons: Sword A+, Lance A+, Axe A+
skillDescription: Use to switch places with an adjacent ally.
description: Heavily armored fighters boasting both an impenetrable defense and a fearsome offense.

name: Great Knight
maxWeapons: Sword B+, Lance B+, Axe B+
skillDescription: If unit is between an ally and a foe, reduces damage to unit by 3 during combat with that foe.
description: Heavily armored knights clad in thick armor. They defend their allies with a variety of weapons.

name: Sword Cavalier
description: Sword-wielding knights who ride freely about the battlefield. They strike a good balance of skills.

name: Lance Cavalier
description: Lance-wielding knights who ride freely about the battlefield. They strike a good balance of skills.

name: Axe Cavalier
description: Axe-wielding knights who ride freely about the battlefield. They strike a good balance of skills.

name: Paladin
maxWeapons: Sword A+, Lance A+, Axe A+
skillDescription: Use to move to the opposite side of an adjacent ally.
description: High-ranking knights with a wealth of experience. Highly mobile and strong against magic.

name: Wolf Knight
maxWeapons: Sword B+, Lance B+, Axe B+, Dagger A+
skillDescription: If unit initiates combat with a knife, inflicts Mov-2 on foe for 1 turn.
description: Knights who dart over the battlefield mounted on wolves. Their knife strikes are the ruin of enemy camps.

name: Mage
description: Magic users who cast spells from tomes. Strong against enemies with high defense.

name: Sage
skillDescription: If unit initiates combat with a tome, grants Atk equal to the number of adjacent allies with tomes.
description: Experienced mages who can call upon great power. Capable of using both tomes and staves.

name: Mage Knight
maxWeapons: Sword B+, Lance B+, Axe B+, Tome A
skillDescription: If unit initiates combat with a physical attack against a foe armed with magic or vice versa, grants Spd+3 during combat.
description: Magic knights who cast spells from horseback, but can also take part in melee combat.

name: Martial Monk
description: Combat monks who use staves to heal wounded allies. They are versed in the martial arts of self-defense.

name: Martial Master
skillDescription: When unit is healed by a staff, all adjacent allies also recover 50% of the HP that the unit recovered.
description: Experienced monks trained in the martial arts. They excel at hand-to- hand combat as well as healing.

name: High Priest
maxWeapons: Tome B+, Staff S, Arts C+
skillDescription: Unit can target itself with healing staves.
description: Masters of staves with wisdom from experience. Their healing powers are lifesaving in battle.

name: Sword Flier
description: Sword fighters who soar through the sky on their pegasus mounts. Strong against magic, but weak to bows.

name: Lance Flier
description: Lance users who soar through the sky on their pegasus mounts. Strong against magic, but weak to bows.

name: Axe Flier
description: Axe-wielders who soar through the sky on their pegasus mounts. Strong against magic, but weak to bows.

name: Griffin Knight
maxWeapons: Sword A+, Lance A+, Axe A+, Staff C+
skillDescription: Unit's space and adjacent spaces have a movement cost of 1 for allies.
description: Experienced knights who fly through the skies on a griffin. They are well- balanced and can use staves.

name: Wyvern Knight
maxWeapons: Sword B+, Lance B+, Axe B+
skillDescription: If unit initiates combat from a space a foe cannot enter, grants Spd+5 during combat.
description: Experienced knights who fly through the skies on wyverns. Though powerful, they fear bows and magic.

name: Thief
skillDescription: Foes do not block this unit's movement.
description: Burglars with a talent for picking locks. They are nimble with their hands and deadly with a knife.

name: Dancer
skillDescription: If unit uses Dance, grants Dex/Spd/Lck+3 to target for 1 turn.
description: Charming performers who can raise an ally's spirits, allowing the ally to act once more in battle.

name: Enchanter
skillDescription: Use to deposit or retrieve weapons and items.
description: A combat medic who skillfully uses items for combat. Can use convoy, and excels at ally-support tactics.
